name: wretry-action
description: An action that retries a GitHub Actions workflow.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && ncc build src/Main.js -o dist && ncc build src/Pre.js -o dist/pre && mv dist/pre/index.js dist/pre.js && rm -rf dist/pre && ncc build src/Post.js -o dist/post && mv dist/post/index.js dist/post.js && rm -rf dist/post
